front.title: PIV card application and middleware interface test guidelines (SP 800-73-4 compliance)

author.organization: Information Technology Laboratory (National Institute of Standards and Technology)

front.abstract: NIST Special Publication (SP) 800-73 contains the technical specifications to interface with the smart card to retrieve and use the Personal Identity Verification (PIV) identity credentials. This document, SP 800-85A, contains the test assertions and test procedures for testing smart card middleware as well as the card application. The tests reflect the design goals of interoperability and PIV Card functions.
